img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky cavern where the protagonist, Wukong, is engaged in combat with a skeletal creature. The scene is part of the "Middle Hollow" walkthrough in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The preceding text mentions "Centipede Guai" and "Cliff of Oblivion," suggesting that Wukong has just encountered or defeated these entities. The following text advises players to look for a tunnel passage to progress further, while cautioning them about hidden Skeletal Snakes. The image serves to illustrate the challenging and eerie environment Wukong must navigate and the enemies he must face.
